title: Data Science Intern
description:
Work on real-world computer vision , NLP and LLM problems

Knowledge of text and vision analytics problems such as text classification, clustering, auto-regression models, image classification, object detection, segmentation, object tracking, OCR.

Work Location


Remote


Must-Have Skills


Python
ML Frameworks – Pytorch, TensorFlow, Pandas, scikit-learn
Use of Computer Vision Techniques and libraries such as OpenCV, Understanding of Word2vec,LSTM, RNNs, Transformers, BERT, Resnet, Unet etc.
Immediate joiners will be preferred , Internship will be for (6 months) *
